courses.title: Full Stack QA Engineering
courses.subtitle: Become a skilled QA engineer with hands-on training in Manual + Automation testing, SQL, API, and modern frameworks.

overview.title: Full Stack QA Engineering
overview.description: This program is designed to provide complete QA Engineering training, covering both manual and automated testing from beginner to advanced levels. Students will gain hands-on experience in continuous test automation using the Cucumber Test Automation Framework with Java and Selenium. The course also focuses on Agile/Scrum methodologies, ensuring learners understand industry best practices.

features.title: Hands-On Projects
features.desc: Work on live projects to apply testing strategies.

features.title: Industry Tools
features.desc: Learn Selenium, JMeter, Postman, and Jenkins.

features.title: Career Support
features.desc: Resume building, mock interviews, and placement support.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Analyst & Engineering
courses.subtitle: Learn to protect systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks.

overview.title: Why Choose Cybersecurity?
overview.description: Get hands-on with ethical hacking, threat detection, and security protocols.

features.title: Industry Tools
features.desc: Learn tools like Wireshark, Kali Linux, and Nessus.

features.title: Career Support
features.desc: Get resume guidance, mock interviews, and placement assistance.

courses.title: Business Technology & Management
courses.subtitle: Learn the intersection of business processes and technology for career growth.

overview.title: Why Choose Business Technology?
overview.description: Acquire skills in digital tools, analytics, and project management for business success.

features.title: Practical Projects
features.desc: Work on real business scenarios with technology solutions.

features.title: Tool Mastery
features.desc: Learn tools like Excel, Power BI, and project management software.

features.title: Career Support
features.desc: Get guidance for business analyst and management roles.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
courses.subtitle: Learn AI & ML concepts and apply them in real-world scenarios.

overview.title: Why Choose AI & ML?
overview.description: Understand AI algorithms, ML models, and practical implementations.

features.title: Hands-On Labs
features.desc: Practice ML algorithms and AI workflows.

features.title: Tools & Frameworks
features.desc: Learn Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.

features.title: Career Support
features.desc: Prepare for AI/ML roles with resume guidance and mock interviews.
